name: Jack Rose
description: '''Jack Rose''' (February 16, 1971 â€“ December 5, 2009) was an American [[guitarist]] originally from [[Virginia]] and later based in [[Philadelphia]]. Rose is best known for his solo acoustic guitar work.  He was also a member of the [[Noise (music)|noise]]/[[Dronology|drone]] band [[Pelt (band)|Pelt]].
